entry.summary: JClic project activities for the area of English language about wild animals. The project has 16 different types of activities: associations, word order, scrambled lyrics, crossword puzzles, and so on.

entry.title: La geometria
entry.author: Estel Busquets i Núria Matabosch
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to infantile education with activities about geometry. The project has two parts: Two dimensions Three dimensions

entry.title: Coloraines
entry.author: Yolanda Hidalgo López
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarten based on the tale Coloraines written by Ferran Hortigüela Bodi of La Galera Publishing House. The project has two parts, the first one to read the tale and the second one with activities about the tale.

entry.title: L'hivern
entry.author: Marta Iglesias i Marta Mañas
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarten about the winter. Throughout the project we can find activities about different aspects related to the station, the cold, animals that hibernate, the population of Arbúcies (Catalonia), the clothes we use in winter, etc.

entry.title: Microorganismes i malalties
entry.author: Sheila Chacon Flores
entry.summary: Set of activities about micro-organisms and infectious diseases. It's aimed to explain the agents that can cause illnesses and the different ways to get an infection. The activities also deal with the immune system and how it works and how to prevent and treat infectious diseases.

entry.title: Sistema sexagesimal
entry.author: J. Amador Bernardo Vázquez
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to secondary education about the sexagesimal system and operations with complex numbers. The project has three different parts.

entry.title: Matemáticas y realidad
entry.author: Ascensión Preciado Bravo, Juan Chacón Jerez, María de la Paz Pérez Rodríguez, María del Mar Mota Medina, María José Moreno Bayort i Raquel Muñoz Vara
entry.summary: Project of activities with 4 sections where daily situation are related with mathematics in order to disclose to pupils the maths that are round them, for instance, mathematics and trade, mathematics and music, mathematics and mass media... Several topics are treated across the activities like decimal numbers, fractions, integers, proportions, Thales' theorem, statistics... Transversal topics are also dealed like road safety education, consumer education...

entry.title: La matèria 3r d'ESO
entry.author: Josep Ramon Planas
entry.summary: Activities about aggregation states of matter: Mixtures and solutions Types of solutions Techniques to separate mixtures and solutions

entry.title: Peixos
entry.author: Montserrat Escribà Solà
entry.summary: Project addressed to infantile education, mainly for children of 4 or 5 years old due to the project has activities with text content. The activities are also complemented with sounds. The project is divided into two parts. One is more playful while the other deals with the fish body parts and few basic characteristics. Moreover, it's also shown the differences between aquarium fishes and fishes from a fish shop.

entry.title: Balenes i altres animals marins
entry.author: Lidia Viñals Serra
entry.summary: Project of activities about sea animals. This project has activities like puzzles, associations, memory games, scrambled letters... The project has two parts: Aquatic mammals Aquatic animals

entry.title: Els esports
entry.author: Sandra Martínez García
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to primary education. The project has six parts: Sports and heath Individual sports Team sports Concepts Sports equipment Sports (evaluation)

entry.title: Vols aprovar les mates?
entry.author: Oriol Bargalló i Marsal
entry.summary: Maths activities about algebra and arithmetic with numerical games and math's curiosities. Through the package the child will learn some memorable quotes of the best mathematicians in history, that allow us access to the following screens.

entry.title: La xocolata
entry.author: Maite Álvarez Leo
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarten about chocolate. In this JCic project there are activities about Maths, Languages, ordering series and letters, associate sounds with written words, etc...

entry.title: El cos
entry.author: Olga Roig Giménez
entry.summary: JClic project with some activities about the human body. Through the package there are activities about associations, puzzles, identification, memory activities...

entry.title: El joc dels colors
entry.author: Enric J. López, Imma Palahí i Maria Borrell
entry.summary: The play of colours is meant for children from infantile education (p3) and special education who do not know neither colours nor letters. This project is divided in ten parts. To know, recognize and work with colour. It not required to make all parts at the same time. The colours' song Introduction activity. Jan sings the colours' song. Yellow, red, blue and green. A pdf file is available for downloading. Exploring the colours Sorting activities. Find the colours in a beach. It's useful for an initial evaluation. Make the puzzle Activity to learn the shapes. Firstly, the activity shows the drawing thereafter shows the colours. An audio record introduces the drawings. We make sure that children know how to relate using the mouse. Coupling game Activity which helps to relate and discriminate the same drawings. Know the pictures and the colours Activity which links shape and colour. Paint the shade Activity which links the shadow of each drawing with its shape and colour. Pick up the brush and paint …

entry.title: Music languages and TIC
entry.author: M. Carme Boix Teruel
entry.summary: Global and interdisciplinary work about music, languages (English, Catalan and Spanish) and IT which includes three themes: The Beatles, Lluis Llach and Joan Manel Serrat in order to work at the music classroom for the third level of secondary school. This educational material has been done and assessed thanks to a type A study leave from the education department. The materials have been firstly evaluated by a discussion group in a CRP (educational resource center).

entry.title: L'espai i els planetes
entry.author: Agustí Puig i Masip
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarden about the space and the planets. There are eight activities to learn the name of the planets and some vocabulary about the space like: astronaut spaceship moon star

entry.title: 26 coses de la classe
entry.author: Immaculada Vilatersana Lluch
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to adults education about 26 different class objects in Catalan. pencil draft chalk computer...

entry.title: El nom
entry.author: Agustí Puig i Masip
entry.summary: Set of activities in Catalan about "names". The project is addressed to secondary education. The images and sounds have been extracted of the Banco de imágenes del MECD website.

entry.title: Xoga coa auga e coa música
entry.author: Antoni Vilalta Carrera i Olga Valls Garcia
entry.summary: Project of activities with associations, puzzles, memory activities, scrambled letters, identification... About some works and their composers.

entry.title: Juga amb l'aigua i la música
entry.author: Antoni Vilalta Carrera i Olga Valls Garcia
entry.summary: Project of activities with associations, puzzles, memory activities, scrambled letters, identification... About some works and their composers.

entry.summary: Project of activities that deals with the vocabulary of the farming tools used at school's vegetable garden. It includes information pages and puzzles supported by images and sounds of the different farming tools.

entry.title: Deportes alternativos
entry.author: Rosa Ana Rodrigo Martín
entry.summary: Project with several activities related to four alternative sport games: ultimate, indiaca, baseball and floorball. The project aim is to introduce these sports to secondary school pupils

entry.title: El vi de la DOQ Priorat
entry.author: J. Vicent Cerdà Navarro
entry.summary: Project of activities about wine from the Priorat Qualified Denomination of Origin addressed to Primary and Secondary school. Throughout the project, several types of grape are shown as well as several grape crop methods and concepts like grafting, pruning, grape picking ...are introduced.

entry.title: Les tres erres
entry.author: Miriam Ortiz Fernández
entry.summary: Project of activities about recycling. Throughout the activities, children should help "cubis" to find their colours, the material they collect, their names, etc... The thread of the activities is a tale which sensitize and recall the three R rule: recycle, reduce and re-use.

entry.title: Daily Routines
entry.author: Mª Teresa Gutiérrez Coyle
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to secondary education about the Present simple. The project has two parts: Vocabulary: Daily Routines Grammar: Present Simple

entry.title: La llegenda dels gegants de Sant Pol
entry.author: Mar Pijuan Ruiz
entry.summary: Project of activities about the giants of Sant Pol de Mar in Catalonia: Mercè de la Murtra and Ben Hassat. The project has four parts: Tale Puzzles Information Text activities

entry.title: Els Cargols - P3, P4 i P5
entry.author: Mònica Gutiérrez Castelló
entry.summary: Project activities addressed to infantile education which includes puzzles, numbers, reading, writing, associations, relationships... About the snails. The project has three parts, one for each of the courses of kindergarden: P3, P4 and P5.

entry.title: Ela arbres
entry.author: Margarita Moret Ferron
entry.summary: Set of activities about trees. It consists of two parts: The first part's aim is to learn and identify deciduous and evergreen trees. The second part's aim is to learn about the elm, the olive, the eucalyptus and the white mulberry.

entry.title: Animalets petits del nostre entorn
entry.author: Maria Torres Español Veu: Roger Llurda
entry.summary: Project of activities about small animals that we found in spring. The project has two parts: small animals (ladybug, butterfly, ant and snail) forest's birds (swallow, hoopoe, nightingale and partridge)

entry.title: Antoni Tàpies
entry.author: Ana Padilla Sánchez
entry.summary: Project of activities about the Antoni Tàpies' artwork. The project is divided into 2 main sections: Artist's artwork. 46 works Activities to do: Puzzles Association games Memory games The reproduction of the illustrations in this activity use the right to quote with educational purposes established in the article 32 of the legal decree 1/1996 from the 12th of April (BOE n. 97, April 22nd). The Department of Education does not own the authoring right derived.

entry.title: El pingüí de Humboldt
entry.author: Neus Diago i Millàn
entry.summary: JClic activities about the Humboldt penguin. The package contains 30 activities. It's divided into 5 sections. Across these sections is shown the penguin main features, its nutrition, reproduction and habitat. It's also highlighted that is a specie in danger due to its declining population.

entry.title: Joan Miró
entry.author: Neus Diago i Millàn
entry.summary: Project of activities focused on the painter Joan Miró The project has 40 activities and it's structured in 7 sections. One section is dedicated to the painter's biography, four sections are dedicated to 4 paintings, another one presents the sculpture artwork and the last one is referred to the Miró Foundation. All the biographic and graphical resources come mainly from the Miró Foundation in Barcelona. The reproduction of the illustrations in this activity use the right to quote with educational purposes established in the article 32 of the legal decree 1/1996 from the 12th of April (BOE n. 97, April 22nd). The Department of Education does not own the authoring right derived.

entry.title: El Bages
entry.author: Joan Martínez Fuentes
entry.summary: Set of 45 JClic activities about the region of Bages addressed to primary education. The activities are classified into three sections or blocks.

entry.title: Les plantes del pati
entry.author: Miquel Jiménez Rodríguez Col·laboració: Jordi Ginesta Casas
entry.summary: Project of activities about plants that can be found in the school CEIP Marià Cubí i Soler of Malgrat de Mar. The project has been created as a complement of the information available on the website of the school about this subject. It is divided into three sections: Trees, Shrubs and Other plants. Also, each of these three blocks has two parts: activities and information for each plant.

entry.title: Consells davant emergències

entry.summary: Project of activities to publicize advices and information about emergency situations while it's also taught the prevention culture in emergency events.

entry.title: Els dofins

entry.summary: Project of activities to learn the dolphins' morphological features as well as its lifestyle and the types of this peculiar mammals. We can find exploring and identification activities, puzzles, text activities, simple and complex associations and memory games.

entry.title: Els colors a educació infantil (adaptat per a baixa visió)
entry.author: Maria Freixa Castelló
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarten about the colours. The project has been thought to learn the name of the primary colours and some secondary colours. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Els colors a educació infantil
entry.author: Maria Freixa Castelló
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarten about the colours. The project has been thought to learn the name of the primary colours and some secondary colours. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Refranes y modismos
entry.author: José Antonio Ávila Romero
entry.summary: Project that deals with the Spanish subject addressed to the first level of secondary school and pupils learning Spanish as a second language. The project goal is to progressively introduce the proverb analysis and Spanish set phrases as well as their presence in the literature taking as starting point the top work of Cervantes.

entry.title: Estudio global de funciones
entry.author: Daniel López Avellaneda
entry.summary: Activities about functions: concept, domain and image, axis, monotony, asymptotes, symmetries...

entry.summary: Set of activities that deals with composting: organic material collection, composting device and the organism which perform the work of decomposing. The project is divided in 4 sections address to different education levels : Infantile education First level of primary schoool Second level of primary school Third level of primary school.

entry.title: Xogando con Matilda
entry.author: Joaquina Pérez Alonso i Marga Tarrío Pillado
entry.summary: Set of activities based on the book Matilda by Roald Dahl addressed to pupil of secondary education. The reproduction of the illustrations and texts in this activity use the right to quote with educational purposes established in the article 32 of the legal decree 1/1996 from the 12th of April (BOE n. 97, April 22nd). The Department of Education does not own the authoring right derived.

entry.title: Estimulación visual
entry.author: Francisco José Romero Cabrillana
entry.summary: Set of activities aimed at visual stimulation. It's been designed to pupils with some kind of visual disability that have enough visual perception to read and write. The application contains two parts: "Vamos a ver" and "Letras y palabras". Both parts have exercises meant to stimulate the vision dealing with aspects like perceptual constancy, figure-background discrimination, visual memory, etc...The second part basically contains letters and words. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Les dents

entry.title: Instruments del món
entry.author: Carles Cervello Cànovas
entry.summary: Project of activities about music. The project has six parts: Europe: castanets, bagpipe, whistle, bouzouki and accordion. Africa: djembé, kora, kalimba i balafon. North Africa and Middle East: darbuka, rebab afghà, ney y lute. America: Pan flute, berimbau, charango, surdo, cuica and drum. Asia: sitar, tabla, shena, rebab de java, dungchen y shakuhachi. Oceania: didjeridoo.

entry.title: Fem feinetes amb les 100 paraules
entry.author: Enric J. López, Imma Palahí i Maria Borrell Col·laboració: Aram López Veu: Nil López
entry.summary: This program is the second part of 100 paraules per escriure. Iria presents us her friends being at the classroom doing some works. There six childs in the classroom. Each character presents one project of activities and each of it has three difficulty levels. It also can be done correlatively. Each project contains twelve works. Listen with Nil Sound catching with Jordi Observe with Aram Think with Mireia Read and wirte with Marc Play with Laia

entry.title: Conociendo el Departamento de Canelones

It's centred around the physical, social and economic knowledge of the department including the relationship between humans and the landscape.

entry.author: Anna Guàrdia Gómez
entry.summary: Project of activities for secondary school that deals with the music's history to be able to recognise the different music periods through its description and hearing it as well, ( Ancient age, Middle age, Modern age, Renaissance, Baroque, Classicism- and Contemporary age, Romanticism, 20th and 21th century.

entry.title: Coneixem els dinosaures
entry.author: Isabel Massó
entry.summary: Project of activities prepared as a working complement for the projects performed at the classroom The package of activities contains association and exploration activities, puzzles ... all of them are addressed to learn the most known dinosaur's names like Rex , Brontosaur , Tryceratops, Pterodactyl ... and also learn its parts.

entry.title: Hobbies and interests
entry.author: M. Eva Solera i Reig
entry.summary: Project of activities about hobbies and interests: basketball, cycling, skiing, drawing, cooking, dancing, walking, piano, shoping, films, photography... . The activities are addressed to secondary education.

entry.title: L'hort de l'avi Joan
entry.author: Eva Crous
entry.summary: Set of activities about the vegetable garden. Along this project we can find association activities, memory or text activities... About what can be found in a vegetable garden, when is the right time to collect fruits or vegetables and which are the tools used.

entry.title: La selva
entry.author: Montserrat Jerez Fernández
entry.summary: Game to introduce the topic of the jungle. It deals with the animal names, the places where they live and the fruits and transports. It's a fantastic trip driven by our friends from ¿The Jungle Book¿. This project is addressed to children at infantile education.

entry.title: Jocs tradicionals valencians
entry.author: Juan Dols Molina
entry.summary: Set of activities addressed to pupils at the second and third level of primary school. The main objectives are: to publicize the Valencian Traditional Games (VTG) and its social-cultural implications on the children through the new technologies and to incorporate the VTG in the children usual games. The section Know the games it mainly contains text and puzzles which provide the required information to carry out the package. The section Let's play! it contains crosswords, letter soups, image associations, etc which will help to reinforce the learning. To extend the contents shown in the package, it can be looked up the webquest Gymcana of the Valencian traditional games at the following web address: http://intercentres.cult.gva.es/cpvergedelfonament

entry.title: Les fruites 2
entry.author: Míriam Albarrán Gómez
entry.summary: Project of eighteen activities about fruits: banana, kiwi, pomegranate, lemon, orange and coconut. There are memory activities, write activities, filling activities, etc...

entry.title: Llengua valenciana 4t primària
entry.author: Jesús Sánchez Aguado
entry.summary: Project of activities about Valencian language addressed to 4th level of primary school. It has been designed as a complement for the textbook Llengua 4t Obri la porta, Comunitat Valenciana from Anaya publishing group. The project contains fifteen topics (the same as the textbook) with activities that can be played by 1 or 2 players.

entry.title: Català oral: La classe
entry.author: Carlota Gallifa Llavina, Irene Vives Armengol i Miquel A. Vadell Torres
entry.summary: Project of activities mainly addressed to newcomers of oral language without written help for the learning of Catalan language through word groups. The activities also included the possibility to identify images by its sounds and reverse. This project deals with the classroom vocabulary: closet, chair, ballpoint pen, chalkboard, board rubber, computer, key, table . .

entry.title: Música del segle XIX
entry.author: Assumpta Fernàndez Sastre
entry.summary: Project of activities about the music of the 19th century. The activities deal with orchestral pieces (symphony, symphonic poem, ballet, and suite), musical instruments found in the orchestras. composers (Beethoven, Chopin, Liszt, Schumann and Mendelssohn) and five opera (Aida, La Traviata, Carmen, The barber of Sevilla and Tannhäuser).

entry.title: Les primeres consonants
entry.author: María José Arriba
entry.summary: This project of JClic activities is addressed to pupils with difficulties in writing and reading. It has also been included dactylology for the deaf pupils. It can used with pupils of primary school to work reading and writing using the first consonants (l, p, m, s, n). The sequence by the letters and words are shown follows the same order as the Estel collection.

entry.title: Pronunciem
entry.author: Josep Pi
entry.summary: The project PRONUNCIEM contains a set of didactic and interactive activities addressed to foreign pupils of secondary school to introduce them in the basic pronunciation of central catalan. The activities deal with the sound identification as well as its pronunciation by means of repetition and imitation. The project Pronunciem includes didactic pronunciation newnesses due to the fact of balancing the relevance between catalan suprasegments (accent, intonation) and specific segments(vowels, consonants) in order to enable the pupils identify the characteristic features of the catalan language. The activities are shown in two differentiated sections: The first section deals with the SUPRASEGMENT ELEMENTS, accent and intonation. The second section deals with the CATALAN PHONEME ARTICULATION, the vowels (stressed, unstressed) and the catalan consonants, either isolated or into context.

entry.title: Los mecanismos
entry.author: Vicente Herrero Medina
entry.summary: Set of activities about the mechanisms addressed to secondari education. The relation of transmission and variation of speed, symbolic representation of mechanical operators and set of mecanismes. Good part of the activities as well as figures and some graphs, are picked up in the book Tecnología de 2º curso de la ESO of the Oxford Publishing house and of the books of Tecnología de ESO of the Bruño Publishing house.

entry.summary: This project aims to show to the pupils different ways that human beings use to express our state of mind and our feelings. It starts from the value of the facial expressions. The face is where most of our senses are together so it's the major attention point for communication. The project contains many types of activities to play and to get in touch with images, songs, sounds, text,etc. in order to understand the value of the communication through our feelings and non-verbal language.

entry.title: Judo (nague-waza)
entry.author: Miguel Àngel Lira Quina
entry.summary: Project of activities about judo: a Japanese system of unarmed combat, now primarily a sport. entry.title: Temps de temps: Vents i ventots
entry.author: Joan A. Solano Querol
entry.summary: The sixth part of the serial has the wind as main topic covering usual and wild behaviour. Through the first part of the package, centred in Catalonia, the pupils learn the wind naming according to the origin as well as its main features. It's also explained the wind intensity and direction from meteorological maps and it's disclosed the Beafort scale. Next, the package is focused in the wild phenomena of the wind: the hurricanes and tornados. The package deals with the causes, features, structure and the measurement scales followed by curious associated facts like country naming and some freak anecdotes. In these pages you will find the other parts of the serie: L'atmosfera, La previsió meteorològica, Observem i mesurem, A bots i barrals and Llamp de rellamp.

entry.author: Bernardita Muñoz Chereau
entry.summary: Clic activities about language: Reading a tale Let's us demonstrate the learned thing Let's us reinforce our writing Let's us listen with attention

entry.title: Hitz25
entry.author: Hur Ezeiza
entry.summary: Hitz25 is a package of clic activities in Vasque about vocabulary. The package has 25 words, phrases and images.

entry.title: La història del so gravat
entry.author: Ramon Llanes Bordes
entry.summary: This package of activities explains the history of the recorded sound from its origins to the present: The precedents and the first inventions and inventors. The evolution of this process: the disc, the microphone, the stereo, the CD...

entry.title: El jazz
entry.author: Ramon Llanes Bordes
entry.summary: Clic activities about Jazz: beginnings styles authors instruments

entry.title: Nens d'arreu del món
entry.author: Teresa Cruanyes
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to immigrant pupils that have just come.

entry.title: Matemanía 5
entry.author: John Ferney Segura, John Fredy Manrique, Luis Alejandro Sánchez i María de los Ángeles Segura
entry.summary: Math activities about polygons: what are them? types characteristics parts ...

entry.title: As bisbarras de Galicia
entry.author: Dositeo Fernández Fuente
entry.summary: Package of activities about the regions of Galize: A Coruña: 16 regions Lugo: 12 regions Pontevedra: 10 regions Ourense: 12 regions

entry.title: Verbos latinos
entry.author: Paloma Garrido Medina
entry.summary: Set of activities to practice and to learn the five Latin conjugations.

entry.title: Discriminació i - ll
entry.author: David Ricard Badenas Sangüesa
entry.summary: Package with 31 activities destined to differenciatef the sounds that we represent with the letters I and LL.

entry.title: El alfabeto dactilológico español
entry.author: Inmaculada Rodríguez Ávila
entry.summary: Package of activities made to complement the knowledge and practice of Spanish sign language. It is addressed to deaf pupils and also to those people listeners whom they want to learn and use of the Spanish alphabet of deaf people.

entry.title: Miquel Martí i Pol 2
entry.author: Lurdes Àvila Morera
entry.summary: Work that turns around some poems of Miquel Martí i Pol about the book "Bon Profit". The activities are addressed to primary school.

entry.title: Introducción a las fracciones
entry.author: José Ignacio Leiva
entry.summary: Clic activities with examples, definitions and exercises about fractions. The package is addressed to introduce and review introduce the pupils in this area.

entry.title: El mar
entry.author: Luis Ugedo Ucar
entry.summary: Clic activities about the ocean ecosystem based on the textbook Ciències Naturals de 1 of Claret publishing house.

entry.title: Housing
entry.author: Lola Guillén
entry.summary: Clic activities about vocabulary related to houses: The house Bathroom Bedroom Living-room Kitchen Dining-room

entry.title: Érase una vez... 1 (Segunda parte)
entry.author: María del Carmen Mánuel Vez
entry.summary: First part of a serie of activities based on the reading and writing method Érase una vez... el país de las letras, following the progressive order of this method: u, a, i, o, e, p, m, n, ñ. This activity needs to install the Truetype font Carmela5.

entry.title: Érase una vez... 1 (Primera parte)
entry.author: María del Carmen Mánuel Vez
entry.summary: First part of a serie of activities based on the reading and writing method Érase una vez... el país de las letras, following the progressive order of this method: u, a, i, o, e, p, m, n, ñ. This activity needs to install the Truetype font Carmela5.

entry.title: Irregular verbs
entry.author: José Hernández Portillo
entry.summary: JClic activities about the irregular verbs in English. Only the past form.

entry.title: Xeografía de Galicia
entry.author: Xoán X. Ferreiro Boquete
entry.summary: Twenty activities addressed to primary school about the relief, the coasts, the population, etc. about Galize.

entry.title: Divisiones con decimales
entry.author: Carlos Eduardo Nuñez Lay i José Tomás Escudero Abadía
entry.summary: This package is divided into 4 parts, each one with 8 operations. In the first one, there are divisions where the dividend has decimals. The 2nd one with decimals in the divisor. The 3rd, there are decimals both in the divisor and the dividend. The last part contains mixed up exercises. The package also includes a help file which aims to support pupils along the exercises.

entry.title: El Renacuajo Paseador
entry.author: Pablo Amaya Tarazona
entry.summary: Clic activities based on the poem "El renacuajo paseador" written by Rafael Pombo. The package has 7 parts. Listen the poem Read the poem Puzzles Filling the gaps Characters Put in order Rafael Pombo

entry.title: Wie ist das Wetter
entry.author: Rosa Maria Ordóñez i Giró
entry.summary: Clic activities about the weather in German. The package has four parts: Meteorologie, Jahreszeiten, Aktivitäten and Wetterbericht.

entry.title: Identificando decimales
entry.author: Elvis Fernando Lesmes González
entry.summary: Clic activities about decimal numbers addressed to primary school.

entry.title: Les nombres en français
entry.author: José Enrique Calle Carmona
entry.summary: Application to learn to count in French. The package includes the system of composition of numbers from 70.

entry.title: Señales de tránsito
entry.author: Alejandro Dellafiore
entry.summary: Clic activities about traffic signs. Regulatory, warning, marker, guide...

entry.title: Les taules de multiplicar - 3
entry.author: Ramon Martí Montesa
entry.summary: Package made for the second level of Primary school students to teach them the multiplication tables progressively. Pupils can't go to the next multiplication table if the 80% of the activities proposed are done.

entry.title: Exercicis de reforç
entry.author: Rosa Maria Trias
entry.summary: Clic activities about Maths addressed to secondary school.

entry.title: Sistemes de numeració en diferents bases
entry.author: Rosa Maria Trias
entry.summary: Set of activities to learn the numeric system, understand the meaning of the figures we use and the positional systems. This package is addressed to first level of secondary school. It's based on a tale done with Power Point.

entry.title: Conozcamos San Luis
entry.author: Paola Allendes
entry.summary: This package contains activities destined to students of primary school, throughout the activities they will learn the political division of the province of San Luis (Argentina) as well as a brief historical review, the relief, its rivers, the flora and fauna.

entry.title: Vocals
entry.author: Francisco Salcedo Torres
entry.summary: Clic activities about vowels addressed to kindergarten. Pupils must discriminate if the vowel is present or not for each image shown.

entry.title: Mi salud, mi cuerpo y la educación física
entry.author: Ramón Cruz del Moral
entry.summary: Project with 25 activities to relate the new technologies to the physical education with activities about the human anatomy, the cardiorespiratory system function and health care recommendations using the physical activity.

entry.title: Any de neu any de Déu... però què us posareu?
entry.author: Ramon Martí Montesa
entry.summary: Clic activities about reading and writing addressed to kindergarten and primary school. The package has different types of activities about clothes in Spanish.

entry.title: Allons au restaurant
entry.author: Mónica Bustamante Alonso-Pimentel
entry.summary: In this package, we find activities to learn French starting form the most important foods and beverages. To listen and repeat conversations that happen in a bar or restaurant. The activities also introduce intercultural aspects from the French gastronomy, including the most famous recipe, the "quiche Lorraine". Additionally, there are some exercises to use and distinguish the partitive article.

entry.title: El ingenioso hidalgo Don Quijote de la Mancha
entry.author: Carlos Medina Viedma
entry.summary: Clic activities about El Quijote. This project has 4 parts: Author / Works Characters Vocabulary / Proverbs Grammar

entry.title: Cálculo mental del 1 al 100 con resolución de problemas
entry.author: Nancy Michol Silva Rudillo
entry.summary: Clic activities about mental arithmetic addressed to primary school.

entry.title: Iniciación a la pelota mano
entry.author: Ángel Javier Casero Pérez
entry.summary: Package of activities to introduce pupils of the third level of primary school to vasque jai alai. Throughout the activities are explained the major characteristics and at the end are some exercises for evaluation.

entry.title: Paco «el chato» (aranès)
entry.author: Rafael Neftaly Zepeda
entry.summary: "Paco, el chato" is a tale which emphasizes to children the importance of knowing its own name. It can used as first activity for teaching the basic literacy. The activities' section contains word analysis and sequencing.

entry.title: Paco "el chato"
entry.author: Rafael Neftaly Zepeda
entry.summary: "Paco, el chato" is a tale which emphasizes to children the importance of knowing its own name. It can used as first activity for teaching the basic literacy. The activities' section contains word analysis and sequencing.

entry.title: Los primeros números por vía visual directa (Segunda parte)
entry.author: Eduardo Martín Sánchez
entry.summary: This Clic package aims to teach children the numbers using common elements of the school like the Cuisenarie rules, fingers, dice dots... There are up to 7 set of activities. Both first deals with groups of 4 numbers (1,4 and 2,5). The activity change is automatic, it can be done by young child. The three following ones are groups of 6 numbers, from1 to 8. Both last are groups of 9 numbers(1,9 and 2,10). It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Los primeros números por vía visual directa (Primera parte)
entry.author: Eduardo Martín Sánchez
entry.summary: This Clic package aims to teach children the numbers using common elements of the school like the Cuisenarie rules, fingers, dice dots... There are up to 7 set of activities. Both first deals with groups of 4 numbers (1,4 and 2,5). The activity change is automatic, it can be done by young child. The three following ones are groups of 6 numbers, from1 to 8. Both last are groups of 9 numbers(1,9 and 2,10). It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

Both last are groups of 9 numbers(1,9 and 2,10). It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: La materia, un estudio educativo
entry.author: Mariel Lopez Arnaiz
entry.summary: Activities though to tell the difference between several material system using a qualitative approach. Starting from its aspect till being able to differentiate between pure substances and mixtures as well as elements and compounds reaching to a easily understanding of the atomic theory. This package also deals with simple separation techniques for heterogeneous mixtures and dissolutions. Finally, there are activities to learn the different stages of the matter and its naming

entry.title: Les lletres
entry.author: Sara Deulofeu
entry.summary: Clic activities addressed to kindergarten for learning to read and write. The package has 5 parts: M L P S T

entry.title: Harry Potter y La Piedra Filosofal
entry.author: Sergio Blanché
entry.summary: Several activities about Harry Potter and the sorcerer's stone film. A interdisciplinary work among the subjects of Mathematics, English, Plastic arts, Music and Informatics.

entry.title: Actividades de Gramática
entry.author: José Luis Marqués Lledó
entry.summary: Clic activities about grammar: names determinants adjectives pronouns verbs adverbs prepositions conjunctions

entry.title: Localización geográfica
entry.author: Domingo Naranjo Montes
entry.summary: Set of activities aimed to locate on a map the andalusian provinces and its borders as well as the Spanish autonomous regions, Spanish provinces, continents, oceans and european countries.

entry.author: Víctor J. Ronda
entry.summary: This package of activities has two parts: the first one is centred in the review of the most significant characteristics of the poetry of Garcilaso and the second one is dedicated to do exercises about the sonnet number XXIII of this author.

entry.author: Francisco García-Pozuelo Díaz i Juana Rello Serrano
entry.summary: Package of activities about the invertebrate animals (mammalian, birds, fish, reptilian and amphibian) and the invertebrates (insects and their anatomy).

entry.summary: Forty clic activities about puzzles.

entry.summary: Twenty activities about Spanish language based on the tale Cuando llovía buñuelos from the book Cuentos al amor de la lumbre of Anaya Publishing house.

entry.title: Cálculo para 3º de primaria
entry.author: Francisco García-Pozuelo Díaz i Juana Rello Serrano
entry.summary: Clic activities addressed to primary school about calculus. The package has 3 parts.

entry.summary: Project of 14 activities focused to stir up the interest of the students by the nature.

entry.title: Clasificación de los animales

entry.summary: Package of activities about the basic classification of the animals according to: its skeleton its diet its reproduction

entry.author: Esteve Hernández Gasió
entry.summary: Activities about formulation and nomenclature of binary compounds: oxides, hidrures, oxoacids, oxo salts and hydroxides. Notes about each topic are included.

entry.title: Física 5º
entry.author: Johana Echevarría Roman i M. José Ortega Pavez
entry.summary: Set of activities about the features of the matter and the Earth's bodies.

entry.title: English 5º
entry.author: Domingo Méndez
entry.summary: English Clic activities for primary school, based on a book from Richmond publishers. The package has sis stories: A mysterious package Where's the treasure? A strange visitor Far from home A friend in trouble The archery contest

entry.summary: Package of activities about the most important renewable energies.

entry.summary: Clic activities about maths addressed to primary school.

entry.summary: Clic activities about reading.

entry.title: A sumar

entry.summary: Clic activities addressed to primary school. The package has three parts: To order How many are there? Which number?

entry.summary: Set of activities done in remembrance of the 200th anniversary of Hans Christian Andersen born. The package contains 3 of the most famous tales: The Ugly Duckling The brave tin soldier Tom Thumb Adaptado para discapacidad visual baja visión.

entry.author: Lourdes Pajares Aparicio
entry.summary: Set of activities done in remembrance of the 200th anniversary of Hans Christian Andersen born. The package contains 3 of the most famous tales: The Ugly Duckling The brave tin soldier Tom Thumb Adaptado para discapacidad visual baja visión.

entry.title: s'Albufera des Grau
entry.author: Gertrudis Carreras Pons
entry.summary: Clic activities addressed to primary and secondary school about s'Albufera des Grau in Menorca. The package has 29 activities about: Birds Plants Terrestrial fauna

entry.title: África, sus países y banderas
entry.author: Federico Arquillos Llera
entry.summary: Clic activity directed to the learning of African countries including capitals, flags and classifying them according to geographical features, coastline, rivers, lakes..

entry.author: Alberto Alonso Gómez
entry.summary: Clic activities of Spanish language about: syllable, diphtong, hiatus stressed and unstressed syllable oxytone, paroxytone and proparoxytone words

entry.author: Alberto Alonso Gómez
entry.summary: Package of activities about la Rioja: situation limits regions rivers localities economy gastronomy traditions ...

entry.title: Matemáticas 4º de primaria
entry.author: Alberto Alonso Gómez
entry.summary: This activity includes the most important contents of the area of Maths in 4th course of primary school. It is thought to use it as a review instrument at the end of the year o every term.

entry.summary: This activity includes the most important contents of the area of Natural Sciences in 4th course of primary school. It is thought to use it as a review instrument at the end of the year o every term.

entry.title: Animaletras
entry.author: Alberto Alonso Gómez
entry.summary: Clic activities about the alphabet in capital letters and lower-case letters.

entry.title: Osservazione, logica e ragionamento
entry.author: Francesc Iglesias Buscà
entry.summary: Package of activities about observation, logic and reasoning by means of association, deduction, comparison exercises, puzzles, sequences logics, etc. The activities are directed mainly to the Instrumental Stage Level 1 of the Schools of Adults.

entry.author: Francesc Iglesias Buscà
entry.summary: Package of activities about observation, logic and reasoning by means of association, deduction, comparison exercises, puzzles, sequences logics, etc. The activities are directed mainly to the Instrumental Stage Level 1 of the Schools of Adults.

entry.title: La vegetació del Montsià
entry.author: Josep Manuel Badia Castell
entry.summary: Set of activities about Montsià mountains' vegetation. A total of 26 activities distributed in 4 sections: Situation (county and mountain range) Description (introduction to the vegetation and features of the mountain range) Trees Plants (an approach to the most characteristic species of the area)

entry.title: Os animais invertebrados
entry.author: José Manuel Boo Pouso
entry.summary: Package focused on Invertebrates for the third level of primary school. Taxonomies, classification and features of the main groups: Profiler, Coelentera, Echinoderm, Mollusc, Arthropod and Annelid. The subgroups are also treated: bivalves, gastropod, cephalopod, crustaceans, insects, arachnids and myriapods), nomenclature, examples, sounds, etc...

entry.title: Los animales invertebrados
entry.author: José Manuel Boo Pouso
entry.summary: Package focused on Invertebrates for the third level of primary school. Taxonomies, classification and features of the main groups: Profiler, Coelentera, Echinoderm, Mollusc, Arthropod and Annelid. The subgroups are also treated: bivalves, gastropod, cephalopod, crustaceans, insects, arachnids and myriapods), nomenclature, examples, sounds, etc...

entry.title: Cada cosa al seu lloc
entry.author: Rosa M. Obradors Puigdellívol
entry.summary: The leading role of these activities is a turtle named "Closcaneta", who is the mascot of an environment campaign.

entry.title: Treballem amb la Closcaneta
entry.author: Roser Casas Bou
entry.summary: Activities focused on jobs related with the environment. The leading role of these activities is a turtle named "Closcaneta", who is the mascot of an environment campaign.

entry.title: Un paseo por JClic
entry.author: Pere Cornellà Canals
entry.summary: Package of activities about JClic. It also includes a review of the activities that can be created with this tool.

entry.title: Un passeig pel JClic
entry.author: Pere Cornellà Canals
entry.summary: Package of activities about JClic. It also includes a review of the activities that can be created with this tool.

entry.title: Derechos del menor
entry.author: Mario Bermúdez
entry.summary: Clic activities based on a book about the rights of the minor published by the Ombdusman of Andalusia

entry.title: Pruebas combinadas de atletismo I: Decatlón
entry.author: Mario Bermúdez, Óscar González i Samuel Urbano
entry.summary: JClic project about the decathlon. The project has 3 parts: The tests Activities Do you want to compete?

entry.title: Introducció a la trigonometria
entry.author: Cristina Mora Lobato
entry.summary: Package of activities addressed to students of secondary education about concepts on trigonometric reasons and trigonometry.

entry.title: Daily routines
entry.author: Josep Cunillera
entry.summary: Clic activities in English about the daily routines.

entry.title: Les fruits
entry.author: Isabel Moro Moro
entry.summary: Activities about fruits addressed to kinder garden and primary school.

entry.title: Frutas
entry.author: Isabel Moro Moro
entry.summary: Activities about fruits addressed to kinder garden and primary school.

entry.title: Los cinco sentidos
entry.author: Elda María Ubillús Namihas
entry.summary: Clic activities about senses: smell taste touch sight hearing

entry.title: Geometría plana (español)
entry.author: Ferran Estruch Mascarell
entry.summary: Project of activities about geometry. There are activities about angles, polygons, lines, triangles, the perimeter...

entry.title: Geometria plana (català)
entry.author: Ferran Estruch Mascarell
entry.summary: Project of activities about geometry. There are activities about angles, polygons, lines, triangles, the perimeter...

entry.title: Les quatre estacions d'Antonio Vivaldi
entry.author: Sonia López Sánchez
entry.summary: JClic activities about Antonio Vivaldi's work "The four seasons". The project has three parts: The Tale The music The instruments The composer The activities are on the subject of listening the concerto, about the orchestra's string instruments and the composer, Antonio Vivaldi.

entry.title: Minibasket
entry.author: José Antonio Mera Bustelo
entry.summary: Clic activities about mini basketball. The project has two parts: Rules Tactics

entry.title: Nivelación restitutiva
entry.author: Héctor Arancibia i Margarita Farias
entry.summary: Package of activities which belongs to the Program Secondary School for everyone developed by Chilean Ministry of Education. This program aims to keep young people at secondary school in order to reach a broader offer in education as well as to get the 12 years of schooling. The program Secondary School for everyone is carried out at the most problematic schools. This package contains several mathematical problems to be solved by pupils.

entry.title: I aleshores no en quedà cap (Deu negrets)
entry.author: Empar Serrano i Catalina
entry.summary: Clic activities about Agatha Christie's Ten Little Niggers.

entry.title: La organización política y social de Andalucía
entry.author: Inmaculada Rodríguez Ávila
entry.summary: Set of activities addressed to Adult Education pupils. Its purpose is to consolidate and to complement the knowledge about the institutions and the most exemplifying symbols of the Andalusia Autonomous Community.

entry.title: Actividades económicas de Andalucía
entry.author: Manuel Martín Gálvez
entry.summary: Clic activities about Andalusia's economy.

entry.title: Les flors de camp i de jardí
entry.author: Maria Torres Español
entry.summary: Activities addressed to primary school about the flowers. The project has two parts: Garden flowers Field flowers

entry.title: La pintura a finales del siglo XIX y principios del siglo XX
entry.author: Coia Jansà i Rafael Delcazo Aced
entry.summary: Clic activities about de postimpressionist painting and the most popular painters and artistic styles like Cézanne, Munch, Gouguin, Van Gogh, Tolouse-Lautrec, Picasso, Miró, etc.

entry.title: Mi primer quijote
entry.author: María Barceló Martínez
entry.summary: Clic activities about El Quijote based on the book Mi primer Quijote by the Espasa publishing house.

entry.title: Actitudes, valores y noviolencia en la educación física y el deporte
entry.author: Daniel Martín Crespo
entry.summary: Clic activities about attitudes and values in physical education addressed to primary school.

entry.title: Gaudí
entry.author: Gemma Grifé, Montse Sitjes, Rosa M. Obradors Puigdellívol i Teresa Esteban
entry.summary: Set of association activities focused on the learning and recognizing some of the most important works of Antoni Gaudi.

entry.title: Gaudí: Dracs
entry.author: Rosa M. Obradors Puigdellívol
entry.summary: Clic activities about Antonio Gaudí's dragons.

entry.title: Els carboners
entry.author: Ferran Morell i Fidela Sánchez
entry.summary: Packages of activities created at the educational training camp of Orient (Mallorca), splitted into 3 parts: Coal merchant Coal cellar The coal merchant's song In addition to this, there are other three projects created at the educational training camps of Mallorca: El salobrar Els animals (ISO image).

entry.title: El salobrar
entry.author: Martí J. Fornés i Pere B. Morey
entry.summary: Packages of activities created at the educational training camp of Es Palmer (Mallorca), splitted into 3 parts: Birds Plants Pools In addition to this, there are other three projects created at the educational training camps of Mallorca: Els carboners Els animals (ISO image).

entry.title: Descobrim la teoria de conjunts!
entry.author: Josefa Panadés Ratera
entry.summary: Package of activities about the set theory. First of all it's shown the main ideas, the essential vocabulary, set representation by Venn diagrams, the set definition... At the end, there are exercises focused on the three main set operations: joint, intersection and subtraction.

entry.title: Un viatge pel món dels enters
entry.author: Josefa Panadés Ratera
entry.summary: Activities about integers. The theory is explained through text activities and puzzles. Additionally, there are mental calculus activities with increasing difficulty and activities about the divisibility theory.

entry.title: Descobrim la trigonometria
entry.author: Adriana Esbrí Rodríguez-Xuàrez
entry.summary: The aim of this activity is to develop the most basic notions of trigonometry and the mathematical knowledge needed in order to completely understand the activity. This package of activities won the award of the "Premis CIRIT 2004" and the first award in the science field of Cornellà (Barcelona).

entry.title: Caperucita Roja 2
entry.author: Elisabeth Freixa Armengol, Maribel Villagrasa García i Marta Roca Fajarnés Dibuixos: Enric Balaguer Roca
entry.summary: Activity pack about the children's story The Little Red Riding Hood. The package has 11 parts with activities about comprehension, the tail, riddles, verbs, articles, etc.

entry.title: La Caputxeta Vermella 2
entry.author: Elisabeth Freixa Armengol, Maribel Villagrasa García i Marta Roca Fajarnés Dibuixos: Enric Balaguer Roca
entry.summary: Activity pack about the children's story The Little Red Riding Hood. The package has 11 parts with activities about comprehension, the tail, riddles, verbs, articles, etc.

entry.title: Plasgeo 1
entry.author: José María Sánchez Navarro
entry.summary: Plasgeo1 is a package of activities whose aim is to approach geometry to pupils of Plastic and Visual arts education. It's an adaptation of the Geoclic program addressed to the first course of secondary School. Plasgeo1 differs from Geoclic in its presentation, structure and activities. It's divided into 3 main sections: the line, the angles and polygons. Each section contains a theorical part (concepts) and a practical part (basic tracing).

entry.title: Personajes del Quijote
entry.author: Francisco Daniel Sánchez Vázquez
entry.summary: Clic activities in Spanish about the Don Quixote's characters.

entry.title: Bufar i fer ampolles: dites i frases fetes catalanes
entry.author: Jordi Roca i Font
entry.summary: Clic activities about Catalan proverbs and sayings.

entry.title: Coneixement del medi social 3r de primària (12 - El pas del temps)
entry.author: Joan Verdaguer i Andrés
entry.summary: This material is part of a large collection of activities that cover all the Catalan curriculum of social and experimental sciences for primary school. The project, created by Joan Verdaguer i Andrès, has been carried out thanks to a sabbatical year granted by the Catalan Ministry of Education (DOGC 3926 - 16/07/03). This set of activities of social sciences, addressed to pupils 8 years old, has 12 units: The landscape The city The town The city hall Work at the countryside The industry The services The communication media El pas del temps The work before and now Holidays during the year The past of the place where I live The material is complemented with the activities for 6-7 years, natural sciences 8, natural sciences 9, natural sciences 10, natural sciences 11, social sciences 9, social sciences 10 and social sciences 11.

entry.title: Coneixement del medi social 6è de primària (04 - El medi natural d'Europa)
entry.author: Joan Verdaguer i Andrés
entry.summary: This material is part of a large collection of activities that cover all the Catalan curriculum of social and experimental sciences for primary school. The project, created by Joan Verdaguer i Andrès, has been carried out thanks to a sabbatical year granted by the Catalan Ministry of Education (DOGC 3926 - 16/07/03). This set of activities of social sciences, addressed to pupils 11 years old, has 15 units: Living in the Earth Relieve, climate and vegetation Spain natural enviroment Europe natural enviroment The spanish population The spanish activity sectors The human activity and the environment The european union The history ages The prehistory The old age The middle age Catalonia in the modern age Catalonia contemporary Catalonia today The material is complemented with the activities for 6-7 years, natural sciences 8, natural sciences 9, natural sciences 10, natural sciences 11, social sciences 8, social sciences 9 and social sciences 10.

entry.title: Los cuentos del lobo
entry.author: David Montañés Ostáriz i Sandra San Miguel Lafuente
entry.summary: Clic activities about the wolf in the tails. read the tail do the activities dress the wolf

entry.title: Marco de la comunicación
entry.author: Nora Lozano Carranza
entry.summary: Package of activities written in Spanish for secondary school. The activities contain exercises about synonymous, antonymous, secret words, letter soups, etc...

entry.title: Aprendiendo a reciclar
entry.author: Isabel Moro Moro
entry.summary: Clic activities about recycling of paper, crystal and packages addressed to kindergarten and primary school.

entry.title: Comptem nens i nenes fins a 5
entry.author: Enric J. López, Imma Palahí i Maria Borrell Veu: Nil López
entry.summary: This package of activities about numbers from 1 to 5 is addressed to children at the infantile education. The package contains 3 sections. The first one, boys and girls appears counting using their fingers. The second one, just the hands are shown counting and at the end, only the numbers are shown.

entry.title: Baserriko animaliak
entry.author: Enric J. López, Imma Palahí i Maria Borrell Veu: Nil López
entry.summary: Package of activities about farm animals structured in two sections: Know Recognize Know, there are several activities of letter ordering and puzzles supported by the animal sound. In the section Recognize we can find relationships name-image and word puzzles.

entry.title: Els animals de la granja
entry.author: Enric J. López, Imma Palahí i Maria Borrell Veu: Nil López
entry.summary: Package of activities about farm animals structured in two sections: Know Recognize Know, there are several activities of letter ordering and puzzles supported by the animal sound. In the section Recognize we can find relationships name-image and word puzzles.

entry.title: Alcalá de Henares
entry.author: Juana Rello Serrano
entry.summary: This package contains 21 activities about monuments of Alcalá de Henares, a town located close to Madrid. The package purpose is to take a walk around the monuments of Alcalá de Henares guided by town celebrities.

entry.title: Aus rapinyaires nocturnes
entry.author: Anselm Alàs
entry.summary: Clic activities about the birds of pray.

entry.title: Conocimiento del medio 4º
entry.author: Francisco García-Pozuelo Díaz i Juana Rello Serrano
entry.summary: Clic activities about experimental science addressed to primary school. The package has two parts: Ecosystems Nutrition

entry.title: Frutas y legumbres
entry.author: Ana Isolina Rodríguez Fernández i José Enrique Calle Carmona
entry.summary: Clic activities addressed to immigrants about fruits and vegetables.

entry.title: Los números racionales: las fracciones
entry.author: Eduardo González Cantos
entry.summary: Package of activities that expect to be the first contact to the rational numbers. It includes graphical exercises to make easier the understanding.

entry.title: Fuerzas
entry.author: Luis Díaz
entry.summary: Clic activities about forces: Movement and deformation Inherence Newton laws Units of measurement

entry.title: Cajón de sastre
entry.author: Francisco García-Pozuelo Díaz i Juana Rello Serrano
entry.summary: Clic package with 55 activities to review the knowledge of 4th of primary school.

entry.title: Iniciació als escacs
entry.author: Ricard Ribes i Novau
entry.summary: Clic activities about chess addressed to primary and secondary school to learn the principal rules of the game.

entry.title: Lecturas: El viento y el sol
entry.author: Miriam Castillo Castillo
entry.summary: Clic activities about reading comprehension.

entry.title: Lengua 4º EP
entry.author: Francisco García-Pozuelo Díaz i Juana Rello Serrano
entry.summary: Package of activities thought to review six units of the book Lengua de 4º de primaria of the Anaya Publishing house.

entry.title: Mariposas
entry.author: Isabel Moro Moro
entry.summary: This package of activities allows to recognize some butterflies, to learn its evolutionary cycle, as well as the name of some of its parts.

entry.title: Miquel Martí i Pol
entry.author: Neus Diago i Millàn
entry.summary: Package of activities about Miquel Martí i Pol, a Catalan poet. In the package we found five parts. The first one about his biography and others about four poetries.

entry.title: Temps de temps: Llamp de rellamp
entry.author: Joan A. Solano Querol
entry.summary: The fifth package of the series is centred in the storms. The focus is in electrical phenomena that occur during a storm: thunders and flashes of lighting. We discover many curious aspects like how the flashes of lighting happen, what kind of consequences can occur, how we can protect ourselves and how far the storm is from us. The last activities are about hailstorms. It's also shown how the hailstorms occur and many other curious information. In these pages you will find the other parts of the serie: L'atmosfera, Observem i mesurem, La previsió meteorològica, A bots i barrals and Vents i ventots.

entry.title: Temps de temps: La previsió meteorològica
entry.author: Joan A. Solano Querol
entry.summary: The weather forecast shown everyday on TV introduce us into meteorology. We learn to distinguish between cold or warm front or to understand several types of weather maps: isobaric, radar, temperature... and by the meantime we learn the isobaric lines, the relationship between the winds and the fronts, the meaning of the areas of low or high pressures, the baric gradient ... At the end, We are able to relate several weather forecast looking at different types of weather maps. Let's say, we become somehow a weathermen/weatherwomen. In these pages you will find the other parts of the serie: L'atmosfera, Observem i mesurem, A bots i barrals, Llamp de rellamp and Vents i ventots.

entry.title: Actividades de demonstração do JClic
entry.author: Rui Fernandes, Francesc Busquets
entry.summary: The main objective of this project is to show samples of the diverse types of activities and the main features of JClic. The project is organized in two parts: first, there is a sequence for each one of the basic types of activities (puzzles, associations, scrambled letters, crossword and text activities). In the second part there is a review of the new features of JClic compared to the previous version, Clic 3.0.

entry.title: Desberdintasunak

In order to make the activity more enjoyable there are puzzles, set among the previous ones, with different number of tokens. At the end of each sections there is an animation.

entry.title: Els noms de la classe (P5)
entry.author: Juan Palomino Reinoso
entry.summary: The usage of the pupil's names is commonly used in Infantile education. Many activities can be done at the Infantile education using the identification of child name and its written representation . These Clic packages "The classroom names" follows this working line, starting from the child's photos taken at the beginning of the year. The activities are structured as follows: Observe. The name in capitals is shown clicking on the photos. Relate. A set of photos is shown to relate them with a names set. Write. Write down the names after selecting the group photo Capital and calligraphical letters. The two types should be related Letter Soup. Letter soups which contain six classmate names.

entry.title: PEMSA: Programa d'Entrenament Mental
entry.author: David Beltrán Dumont
entry.summary: Application of 62 packages of activities splitted out into three blocks according to the three levels of primary school. The objective is to develop and improve the basic psychological processes which afterwards will affect several areas of the academic curriculum (memory, attention, perception, observation, intuition, reasoning...). Each package is made up by ten activities where each pupil should check out his/her abilities. It¿s recommended to read the attached documentation for an optimal use of this package of activities

entry.title: Instruments i jugarolls musicals de les Pitiüses

entry.title: Temps de temps: A bots i barrals
entry.author: Joan A. Solano Querol
entry.summary: From the fourth issue of the series, we will deepen in the most known meteorological phenomena: rain, storm and wind. This package is focused in the rains revealing its causes, undesirable effects (flooding) and recommendations to act correctly when we are suffering a flood. A short review of the most intense rains that affected the Catalan country. In these pages you will find the other parts of the serie: L'atmosfera, Observem i mesurem, La previsió meteorològica, Llamp de rellamp and Vents i ventots.

entry.summary: Andromeda is a large collection of Clic activity packages designed as a complementary material for the items of the Catalan curriculum of social sciences for primary school. For a complete reference of their objectives and contents, visit the Andromeda's web . The distribution of the activity packages is divided in two groups. In this page are the items corresponding to the upper level. The packages for the intermediate level are in the previous page.
