entry.title: Dalí
entry.author: Dolça Vert
entry.summary: This package contains several activities related to Dalí. The aim is to easily learn his work and biography doing exercises.

entry.title: Zer dakizu paint programaz?
entry.author: Alejandro Dellafiore
entry.summary: Package of activities about how to use the Windows application "Paint". The aim of the application is to learn how to use the icon tools located in the main screen of the program.

entry.title: ¿Cuánto sabes de Paint?
entry.author: Alejandro Dellafiore
entry.summary: Package of activities about how to use the Windows application "Paint". The aim of the application is to learn how to use the icon tools located in the main screen of the program.

entry.title: El alfabeto griego
entry.author: Àurea Pérez
entry.summary: Clic activities about the Greek alphabet addressed to high school. The package has 4 parts about the name of the letters, the sounds, the capital letters and small letters and their transcription and transliteration. For more information you can visit this web: http://www.xtec.cat/~aperez19/

entry.title: L'alfabet grec
entry.author: Àurea Pérez
entry.summary: Clic activities about the Greek alphabet addressed to high school. The package has 4 parts about the name of the letters, the sounds, the capital letters and small letters and their transcription and transliteration. For more information you can visit this web: http://www.xtec.cat/~aperez19/

entry.title: English 6º
entry.author: Domingo Méndez
entry.summary: English Clic activities for primary school, based on a book from Richmond publishers.

entry.title: Petrés
entry.author: Maria Josep Soriano
entry.summary: Clic edited by the "Coordinadora d'Escoles en Valencià" of "Camp de Morvedre" county, in Valencia. It was made due to the VII festival of schools, done in Petrés in 2003. It has two sections : one with information about the town and another with puzzles and games.

entry.title: Un viaje al mundo del teatro
entry.author: Joana Lloret Cantero
entry.summary: The package "Un viaje al mundo del teatro (siglos XVI-XVII)" is structured into four parts: IntroductionIt's focused on the European writers and its works: Moliere, Lope de Vega, Calderón de la Barca and Shakespeare. The Italian Commedia dell'arteIn this section is analysed this type of theatre (without previous text). The characters features (dresses, masks, condition, gesticulation, improvisation ... ) The Spanish comedia nacionalHere, the activities are centred in the open-air theatre as a scenic space, the genres which were performed as well as the attendees distribution according to its economical condition and sex. The Elizabethan theatreThis section is about Shakespeare's "The Globe" Theatre. Explaining some of its stage features.

entry.title: Tirant: El clic
entry.author: Miquel Àngel Llorenç i Oltra
entry.summary: This package tries to introduce the medieval Catalan novel "Tirant lo Blanc" to the students of the second level of secondary school. The package is organized in 5 sections: Argument Author Other authors The love Exercises

entry.title: Els números romans
entry.author: Ferran Estruch Mascarell
entry.summary: Clic activities about roman numbers: rules, equivalences between decimal and roman numbers, current expressions where roman numbers are used, etc.

entry.title: Potencia
entry.author: María Elena Abalo
entry.summary: Package of activities about powers, with graphs, problems and combined exercises.

entry.title: Regles de derivació
entry.author: Catalina Mayol
entry.summary: Package of activities about the derivation rules. It's been thought for secondary education as a tool to review and learn these rules.

entry.title: London
entry.author: Josep Sala i Esquena
entry.summary: Package of activities about English language centred in London. The contents of the package are: Learning of the vocabulary related with travelling. Speaking practise with a hotel / hostel receptionist. Reading and comprehension of texts about the London culture and history. Present perfect exercises. Contrast present perfect and simple past. Question tags exercises. Reading of a letter or a travel diary.

entry.title: Sustantivos y adjetivos
entry.author: Nancy Fernández
entry.summary: Package of language activities with simple and complex associations, text activities and puzzles The aim of these activities is to make the pupils apply the knowledge learned at the classroom.

entry.title: Numeritos
entry.author: María Elena Abalo
entry.summary: Package of activities for the second year of primary school. It contains exercises with two and three figure numbers. It's focused in: order reading and writing composition sum and subtraction bigger than, smaller than easy series

entry.title: Silabitas
entry.author: María Elena Abalo
entry.summary: Package of activities addressed to the second year of primary school. It's a single package with exercises of splitting Spanish words into syllables, and sort words alphabetically.

entry.title: Els arbres de la nostra escola
entry.author: Àngels Surís Jordà i Mª Josep Guzmán
entry.summary: Package of activities for kindergarten and primary school about the school's trees. The package is divided into 6 sections: The trees Tale Song Word search Riddle Poem

entry.title: Estadística en 3º de ESO
entry.author: Gabriel Sosa Felipe
entry.summary: This package of activities starts with a review of some basic concepts needed for start working on statistics, and continues with easy problems about interpretation of data.

entry.title: TETRAVEX: Zenbakidun buruhausgarriak
entry.author: Luis Alejandro Sánchez Cortés
entry.summary: Numeric puzzles using squares with one number in each side. In order to solve it, all the neighbouring sides must have the same number.

entry.title: TETRAVEX: Rompecabezas numéricos
entry.author: Luis Alejandro Sánchez Cortés
entry.summary: Numeric puzzles using squares with one number in each side. In order to solve it, all the neighbouring sides must have the same number.

entry.title: Civilizaciones antiguas
entry.author: Isidoro Gómez Navarro
entry.summary: This package of activities reviews how the Neolithic man evolved. The invention of writing and its development in the four main civilizations, their organization, how they live and the beliefs of the citizens from Egypt and Mesopotamia.

entry.title: La Grecia antigua
entry.author: Isidoro Gómez Navarro
entry.summary: Package of activities about the ancient Greece, with exercises about: The regions of Greece The theatre The architecture The mythology The language

entry.title: La antigua Roma
entry.author: Isidoro Gómez Navarro
entry.summary: Package of activities about the roman world and its legacy. The program has activities consisting in the virtual re-construction of some monuments of Rome.

entry.title: La vida de Claudio Arrau
entry.author: Anthony Uyarte Acuña
entry.summary: Package of activities about Claudio Arrau's life, in commemoration of the first century of the born of this worldwide admired Chilean pianist. The package has two parts: first, some activities about Arrau's childhood, adolescence and adult life, and exercises about the most relevant aspects of they biography.

entry.title: Menjars, begudes i dolços catalans
entry.author: Sílvia Prieto Delgado
entry.summary: Package of activities addressed to special education, kindergarten and primary school. The main aim is to learn the Catalan vocabulary related to food.

entry.title: Terra de gegants
entry.author: Agnès Vila Catalán, Montse Capdevila, Montserrat Alsina i Montserrat Pérez Dibuixos: Carla Aparicio Fotografies: Colla Gegantera de Mollet del Vallès
entry.summary: Land of Giants is a clic made to approach children to the world of "gegants" (giants) and "capgrossos" (big-heads), very important figures in the Catalan folklore. The package has been made possible thanks to the co-operation of the Colla geganterra de Mollet del Vallès.

entry.title: Les vêtements
entry.author: Juanjo Fernández Sola
entry.summary: French language activities about the vocabulary related to cloths. The activities are organized in increasing difficulty. Each block starts with an exploration activity with audio in order to let to hear the pronunciation of the words, following with an association activity between images and words. The next part is based on image identification according to the sound heard. There are also puzzles and scrambled letters, included in the package in order to brighten up the activities.

entry.title: Classifiquem roques sedimentàries
entry.author: Josep Mas Raguer
entry.summary: Package of activities about sedimentary rocks. The package has two sections: The first one it's a introduction to the sedimentary rocks: main groups (dendritic, bio-chemical and organic rocks), how the rocks of these groups were created and its classification. The second section is a set of exercises about the learned concepts.

entry.title: Així sona...
entry.author: Josep Rafael Albert Guerola
entry.summary: This package is a set of activities addressed to pupils of primary school, based on the instruments of the symphonic orchestra. The pictures are taken from supermusics.

entry.title: Household, rooms and furniture
entry.author: Alfonso Javierre Conesa
entry.summary: Clic activities about the English vocabulary related to the spaces and furniture of the house: Living-room, bathroom, dining-room, bedroom, kitchen, hall, garage, garden, fridge, sink, cooker, cupboard, shower, bath, washbasin, toilet, mirror, bed, armchair, wardrobe, chair, sofa, table and television.

entry.title: ETICLIC Llegim etiquetes
entry.author: Marta Montero
entry.summary: Package of 26 activities, based on the logos and labels of some commercial products, with three different typographies: capitals, roman and print letter. The activities deal with label recognition through the images, associations with the products, puzzles and scrambled letters.

entry.title: Lengua para 3r ciclo de primaria
entry.author: Laurentino Gómez i Moncho Marín Calvo
entry.summary: Spanish activities for the third cycle of primary school. The activities are based on four texts: "Cuento de la cebolla", "Relato de los gritos" (Robert Fulghum), "Las abarcas desiertas" (Miguel Hernández) "El mercader de burros" (Idries Shan). Comprehension activities are proposed based on these texts. Additionally, some other activities (orthography, word classification, verb tenses and syntactic analysis) are included in other packages.

entry.title: La fiesta de Bubú Locomotoro
entry.author: Moncho Marín Calvo
entry.summary: This package of activities has two section : the first one presents a Spanish tale to be readed. The second one offers several activities about comprehension.

entry.title: Zein da zein?
entry.author: Ana Mª Álvarez de Arcaya i Blanca Besga
entry.summary: This activity has been developed for children of 3, 4 and 5 years-old. It consists in associate two draws : the first one is coloured and it's splitted into several pieces that are mixed up and located in different spatial positions, and the second one is a black and white draw. The difficulty is increased according to the pupil age.

entry.title: ¿Cuál es cuál?
entry.author: Ana Mª Álvarez de Arcaya i Blanca Besga
entry.summary: This activity has been developed for children of 3, 4 and 5 years-old. It consists in associate two draws : the first one is coloured and it's splitted into several pieces that are mixed up and located in different spatial positions, and the second one is a black and white draw. The difficulty is increased according to the pupil age.

entry.title: Durangaldea (El Duranguesado)
entry.author: Ricardo Totrika
entry.summary: Package of activities about the Basque county of Durangaldea: geography, history and information about their towns.

entry.title: Ekosistemak - Eguraldia (ekosistemak)
entry.author: Emiliano Taldeo i Ricardo Totrika
entry.summary: Package of activities about ecosystems and meteorology following the text book of the Giltza-Edebé publishing house..

entry.title: Ekosistemak - Eguraldia (eguraldia)
entry.author: Emiliano Taldeo i Ricardo Totrika
entry.summary: Package of activities about ecosystems and meteorology following the text book of the Giltza-Edebé publishing house..

entry.title: Koloreak
entry.author: Aitxiber Etxarri i Santiago Palacios Navarro
entry.summary: In this package we find the colours and its Basque's name. It's an easy package addressed to lower levels in primary school or at the end of the kindergarten. There are 4 options: Ikasi ( to learn the name of the colours) Oroimena (to train the memory by paring activities) Lotu ( association activities) Idatzi ( to train the writing)

entry.title: Os músculos
entry.author: Gerardo Pazos
entry.summary: Clic activities about the muscles.

entry.title: The colors (mensaxes en galego)
entry.author: Hugo Pérez Becker
entry.summary: Clic activities about the name of the colours in English.

entry.title: The colors
entry.author: Hugo Pérez Becker
entry.summary: Clic activities about the name of the colours in English.

entry.title: Discovering words (third course)
entry.author: Antonio Ángel Ruiz Molino
entry.summary: Clic activities about English vocabulary: Numbers Classroom Colours Toys Family Body Clothes Food 1, 2 and 3 Animals Actions

entry.title: Discovering words (first course)
entry.author: Antonio Ángel Ruiz Molino
entry.summary: Clic activities about English vocabulary: Numbers Classroom Colours Toys Family Body Clothes Food 1, 2 and 3 Animals Actions

entry.title: Aniclic: método de lectura (Discapacidad visual baja visión)
entry.author: Juan Carlos Rodríguez Lorenzo
entry.summary: Aniclic is the Clic version of Animalitos, a reading/writing method for the Spanish culture and language. It was published in Germany in 1995. It follows the same sequence of phonemes and spelling of Animalitos, as well as the same teaching concept of reading. Aniclic should not be considered as a real reading whole method, but just a resource that complements the daily work. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Aniclic: método de lectura
entry.author: Juan Carlos Rodríguez Lorenzo
entry.summary: Aniclic is the Clic version of Animalitos, a reading/writing method for the Spanish culture and language. It was published in Germany in 1995. It follows the same sequence of phonemes and spelling of Animalitos, as well as the same teaching concept of reading. Aniclic should not be considered as a real reading whole method, but just a resource that complements the daily work. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Trabajar en el laboratorio de química
entry.author: Olga Valiente Francés
entry.summary: The activities of this application are directed to the learning of the basic material used in a chemical laboratory in order to do the practices properly. It's also remarked the safety rules needed in a school laboratory of chemistry: understand the chemical's pictograms, get used to work in a laboratory understanding that chemical assay can be dangerous if all the safety measures are not considered.

entry.title: Formulación
entry.author: María Luisa Sancho
entry.summary: Package of activities about inorganic chemistry addressed to higher levels of secondary school.

entry.title: Grupos consonánticos
entry.author: Miriam Castillo Castillo
entry.summary: Package of Spanish activities about some consonantal groups: bl, fl, cl, dr, cr, gr, pla, tro, pal...

entry.title: Partes invariables de la oración
entry.author: Miriam Castillo Castillo
entry.summary: Package of activities about the parts of the sentence. The application has 4 parts: Conjunctions Adverbs Prepositions Interjections

entry.title: Taller del cuento "El príncipe feliz"
entry.author: Miriam Castillo Castillo
entry.summary: Activities based on the educational software El príncipe feliz, published by the Enlaces network of the "Ministerio de Educación y Cultura" of Chile.

entry.title: Razonamiento verbal
entry.author: Fernando Reyes, Nora Lozano Carranza i Silvia Mazuelos Bravo
entry.summary: Package of Spanish activities for secondary school, with several kinds of exercises: Synonyms Antonyms Comprehension Analogies Fill in . . .

entry.title: Introducción al concepto de fuerza
entry.author: Consuelo Jiménez Jiménez
entry.summary: Package of activities addressed to Secondary School about force.

entry.title: Fundamentos de computación
entry.author: Juan Manuel Pacherre Rodríguez
entry.summary: Activities about Informatics in a broad sense : hardware, software, computer elements, peripherals and its classification, the keyboard, the mouse and its parts and so on. These activities are addressed to pupils from the 4th level of primary school.

entry.summary: Activities about Informatics in a broad sense : hardware, software, computer elements, peripherals and its classification, the keyboard, the mouse and its parts and so on. These activities are addressed to pupils from the 4th level of primary school.

entry.title: Actividades de lecto-escritura
entry.author: Edith Johana Barón, Flor Alba Olaya i Pablo Amaya
entry.summary: Package of activities thought to train the usage of the letters "V" and "B" and the combinations "mp" and "mb" in Spanish. This package is for the first and the second level of primary school.

entry.title: Papá perrito Motas
entry.author: Edith Johana Barón, Flor Alba Olaya i Pablo Amaya
entry.summary: Fairytale with reading comprehesion activities in Spanish: puzzles, writing, associations; there are versions for the first and second level of primary school.

entry.author: Antonio Fco. Devesa Botella, Carmen Gutiérrez Vargas, Fernando López Juárez i Rosa Fargueta Calatayud
entry.summary: This application has four packages of activities with exercises about: Powers Roots Addition and subtraction of roots Product and quotient of roots

entry.title: Monomios y polinomios
entry.author: Antonio Fco. Devesa Botella, Carmen Gutiérrez Vargas, Fernando López Juárez i Rosa Fargueta Calatayud
entry.summary: This package of activities has three sections: Introduction to the algebraic language Exercises about monomials Exercises about polynomials

entry.title: Monomis i polinomis
entry.author: Antonio Fco. Devesa Botella, Carmen Gutiérrez Vargas, Fernando López Juárez i Rosa Fargueta Calatayud
entry.summary: This package of activities has three sections: Introduction to the algebraic language Exercises about monomials Exercises about polynomials

entry.title: Relieve español
entry.author: Antonio García Fernández
entry.summary: Activities about the main mountains, planes and rivers of Spain.

entry.title: Actividades de educación infantil (P5)
entry.author: Merche Martín
entry.summary: Two packages addressed to children of 4 to 5 years old There are three sections for childs of 5 years old: Autonomy Communication Reading

entry.author: Merche Martín

entry.title: La función de nutrición
entry.author: María Feliciana Lara Romero
entry.summary: Package of activities about the function of human nutrition. It consists of five packages; in four of them they are developed each one of the apparatuses that collaborate in the nutrition and in the other one a vision integrated of them. It contains video archives that allow to see the operation of the heart and the lungs.

entry.title: El Coto de Doñana
entry.author: Manuel Orta Peral
entry.summary: Package about the national park of Doñana, with activities about the flora and fauna, location, history... and a special mention to the "king of Doñana": the Lynx.

entry.title: Pablo Neruda y Gabriela Mistral
entry.author: Viviana Schulz Valdes
entry.summary: Activity package about the biography of two Chilean poets awarded with the Nobel Prize: Pablo Neruda and Gabriela Mistral A way to introduce children to poetry and creation.

entry.title: A gaivota da coviña
entry.author: Sabela Núñez Singala
entry.summary: Package of activities about a tale on the consequences of the ecological disaster caused by the collapse of the oil tanker "Prestige" in the Galician coast. The package has 3 parts : Tale Puzzles Comprehension

entry.title: La gaviota de «a coviña»
entry.author: Sabela Núñez Singala
entry.summary: Package of activities about a tale on the consequences of the ecological disaster caused by the collapse of the oil tanker "Prestige" in the Galician coast. The package has 3 parts : Tale Puzzles Comprehension

entry.title: Actividades de matemáticas 6º de primaria
entry.author: Juan Martínez González
entry.summary: Clic activities about maths destined to 6th course of Primary School: Integer numbers and operations with integers. Powering and roots. Multiples and divisors. Fractions. Angles. Time units. Decimal numbers. Operations with decimal numbers. Proportionality. Percentages. The calculator. The circumference. Capacity units. Surface units. Area and perimeter of geometric figures. Processing of information.

entry.title: Els instruments musicals durant l'edat mitjana
entry.author: Pepita Llauradó i Plana
entry.summary: The aim of these activities is to get into the organologic aspect of the medieval music. We should start from the assumption of we already have a minimum knowledge about the systematic classification of musical instruments including the basic medieval ones.

entry.title: El peix irisat
entry.author: Yolanda Cardona Casanova
entry.summary: Package of activities addressed to read and write based on the tale El peix irisat by Marcus Pfister. The package has 3 parts: The tale Learning with the tale. Learning with fishes.

entry.title: La reproducción de las plantas
entry.author: M. Àngels Rius Masalles
entry.summary: Package of activities about the reproduction of plants, the flowers and the fruits.

entry.title: La reproducció de les plantes
entry.author: M. Àngels Rius Masalles
entry.summary: Package of activities about the reproduction of plants, the flowers and the fruits.

entry.title: Del raïm a la verema
entry.author: Francesc Sánchez Guerrero
entry.summary: Package of activities addressed to elementary school. This package provides help on learning the different parts of the grape, vine and wine production as well.

entry.title: Dinosaures infantils
entry.author: Josep Maria Turuguet
entry.summary: Several activities about observation, puzzles, colours and numbers.

entry.title: Estats de la matèria
entry.author: Enric Peiris Poch
entry.summary: Package of activities about the three states of matter: Solid Liquid Gas

entry.title: Escacs
entry.author: Rafael Delcazo Aced
entry.summary: Package of activities about chess. We can find 6 sections : Introduction The chessboard The pieces Algebraic notation How to move the pieces Basic lessons

entry.title: Introducció al beisbol
entry.author: Agustí Cuevas i Emili Escolà
entry.summary: Activities intended to discover Baseball in the school context. This package includes: Rules Brief history of baseball Questionnaires Entertainments, . . .

entry.title: Jacint Verdaguer
entry.author: Jesús Batlle Auguet
entry.summary: Package about the catalan writter Jacint Verdaguer. The package has activities about his life, places where he was living and his most important literary works.

entry.title: El clic de les joguines
entry.author: Lurdes Leandro i Andreu
entry.summary: Connection activities based on pictures of toys ( name-photo, name-name), puzzles and some text activities.

entry.title: Grups consonàntics PL, BL, FL, GL, CL
entry.author: Sònia Sanchis Bofarull
entry.summary: This package of activities is addressed to Infantile or Primary school (pupils who have difficulties with the pronunciation, writing or discriminating those words which contain the following consonantal groups: pl, bl, fl, gl, cl). The package is made of gradual activities with words containing these consonantal groups located at the beginning and in the middle of the words. According to the activity, auditory help is also provided.

entry.title: Grècia antiga
entry.author: Josep Maria Turuguet
entry.summary: This is a package of activities about the Classic Greece. It's divided in four sections : The country Gods and myths Polis and politics Artists and philosophers

entry.title: Problemes de càlcul mental
entry.author: Ferran Estruch Mascarell
entry.summary: 122 simple problems distributed into 4 packages thought to enforce mental calculus in the second and third cycle of Primary school. These problems are oriented to work with simple operations.

entry.title: La llengua de signes catalana (LSC)
entry.author: María José Arriba
entry.summary: Package of activities about the Catalan Sign Language. The package contains several videos with the signs of colours, months, days...

entry.title: Diccionem
entry.author: Vador Solanes i Salarich
entry.summary: DICCIONEM is a Clic activities about the use of the dictionary. The activities are addressed to 2nd Cycle of Primary school. The objectives of the application are: To know the different types of dictionaries. To reinforce the knowledge of the dictionary as a basic search engine. To reinforce the understanding of definitions. To identify different meanings of the same word. To identify words that cannot be found in the dictionary. To avoid the use of incorrect words. To enrich the vocabulary. To make pleasant and playful the use of the school dictionary.

entry.title: Transportes
entry.author: Grupo de trabajo "Carrechiquilla"
entry.summary: The programme ¿Transportes¿ appeared to help pupils of Infantile and Primary school stressing those with special education needs. This package is focused on the more common means of transport : terrestrial, by sea or by air. The programme has a large number of screens that are thought to empower the knowledge of lecture thought elements of the social and physical media. A help file with a technical and didactic guide can be downloaded.

The packages of activities was made in co-operation with the "Coordinadora d'Escoles en Valencià de la Ribera".

The activities' goal is to introduce the student to the different coins used in these countries, what is the exchange rate with respect to the peseta and what are the different sub-divisions of the basic monetary units (dollar and pound). The activities make use of graphics representing all the different coins for easy recognition for the student. The activities are varied and include text and graphic associations, written response, crosswords,...

entry.summary: This package of activities is for the first cycle of primary school. It has 4 blocks: Positioning of notes on the stave and with some instruments of the orchestra. entry.title: Geoclic (italiano)
entry.author: Jaume Bartrolí Brugués Col·laboració: Antonia Martínez Guirao
entry.summary: Geoclic is a group of 500 geometry activities grouped in 40 packs. This activities are designed for high school students and can be used as part of the curriculum or as complement to the class work. GeoClic english adaptation has been done with the support of the Socrates-Minerva Programme Project V.I.M.(116338 - CP - 1 - 2004 - 1 - IT - MINERVA - MPP)

entry.summary: Clic activities destined to learn Spanish language. The activity has only one package where we learn the different kinds of words in Spanish: oxytones paroxytones proparoxytones It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Palabras, sílabas y acentuación
entry.author: Juan Antonio Vacas Rodríguez
entry.summary: Package of activities directed to learn to accentuate the words, knowing the diphthongs and hiatuses and following the norms of the R.A.E. de la Lengua. Throughout the package also child are remembering and learning these norms.

entry.title: Sinónimos y antónimos
entry.author: Rafael Rodríguez Martín
entry.summary: Clic activities about Spanish language destined to learn synonymous and antonyms.

entry.title: Separar i comptar síl·labes
entry.author: Enric Peiris Poch
entry.summary: Clic activities about Catalan language. The package has three levels destined to Primary and Secondary school. 1st Level: Syllables 2nd Level: Digraphs 3rd Level: Syllables, diphthongise and hiatuses

entry.title: Inversas
entry.author: José Franco Benítez
entry.summary: Clic activities about Spanish language. The application has 5 parts to practice these syllables: AS AR AN AL AM, AP, AC

entry.title: Ga-go-gu
entry.author: Claudia Lovrincevich
entry.summary: Clic activities about Spanish language. The objective of this activity is learn how to use the syllables ga, go, gu.

entry.title: L'abecedari
entry.author: M. Jesús Conangla
entry.summary: Package about the practice and memorization of the alphabet in Catalan. This package is formed by activities which it is needed to use the auditory and visual attention and the practice with repetitive and cumulative activities.

entry.title: Ortografía
entry.author: Reinaldo Carrascosa Vallejo
entry.summary: Clic activities about Spanish orthography. This package has fifteen lessons: The alphabet and to order words Capital letters M before p and b ca, que, qui , co, cu, ce, ci c, d, z r, rr g, j, gu, gü b, v s, x y, ll h Homonymous words Orthographic rules I learn words Antonymous and synonymous words The package includes document of Word with basic orthographic rules of the Spanish language.

entry.title: Twelve adjectives
entry.author: Catalina Carrasco Muñoz, Francisco José Sánchez García, José Antonio Guerao i Margarita Tudela
entry.summary: Clic activities about some English adjectives. The package has 4 parts: Adjectives 1 Adjectives 2 Adjectives 3 Opposites

entry.title: El conte
entry.author: Carme Congost Escura, Guacimara Martínez i Pilar Congost Escura
entry.summary: This package contains 3 stories in Catalan to Primary School. These activities are the result of a Bordils' school project. The lead soldier. The new Emperor's dress. The stamp. After the stories there are some activities about them classified by levels.

entry.title: Vamos a leer - 2
entry.author: Claudia Lovrincevich, Elisabeth Castillo i Marisa Fernández
entry.summary: Package of activities for the learning of the reading. In the application we found activities where children have to differentiate short words from long words, to associate name-image, to discriminate if a word begins by vowel or consonant, soups of letters, riddles...

entry.title: Actividades de lenguaje para educación primaria
entry.author: Rafael Rodríguez Martín
entry.summary: Clic activities about spelling in Spanish. There are six different types of activities: Dictations. Lists Tongue twisters Riddles Listening (dictations) Listening (words)

entry.title: Prefijos
entry.author: Rafael Rodríguez Martín
entry.summary: Clic activities about prefixes in Spanish. The package has three parts: auto-, porta-, tele-. des-, in- (1). des-, in- (2).

entry.title: Inlgés 4º EP
entry.author: Domingo Méndez
entry.summary: Clic activities for primary school about the modal verb can/can't, description of landscapes and situation on maps.

entry.title: Abecedario
entry.author: Rafael Rodríguez Martín
entry.summary: Twelve activities about the alphabet. In the package we find activities where child have to put in order letters, sentences and find witch letter goes after another one. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Abecedario (Discapacidad visual baja visión)
entry.author: Rafael Rodríguez Martín
entry.summary: Twelve activities about the alphabet. In the package we find activities where child have to put in order letters, sentences and find witch letter goes after another one. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Abecedario
entry.author: Rafael Rodríguez Martín
entry.summary: Twelve activities about the alphabet. In the package we find activities where child have to put in order letters, sentences and find witch letter goes after another one. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Salut les copains!
entry.author: Llanos Navalón Yeste
entry.summary: Clic activities in French to Secondary School based on the French book of Anaya Publishing House. In the package we find activities about: People presentation. Present of verbs finished in -er: faire, to aller and to come. Interrogative estructures, il and a Geography of France, products, monuments and characteristics of some localities.

entry.title: What are they doing?
entry.author: Celia Sánchez Albarracín, Francisco José Sánchez García i José Antonio Guerao Navarro
entry.summary: Clic activities about English grammar destined to Primary School. The objective is practice the Present Continuous: The package has the following contents: Verbs: write, dance, play, laugh, swim, read, run, rain. Personal pronouns. Sentences in present continuous with the 8 previous verbs. Oral and written structure of sentences and pronouns. Yes/No questions and Short answers. Some images are from the book "Big Red Bus 3", by Ma José Lobo and Pepita Subirà (Ed. McMillan - Heinemann).

entry.title: Otsoa eta Azeria
entry.author: César Martínez Iturralde
entry.summary: Clic activities for to learn Basque. After reading a story child can do different activities about: understanding spelling writing the story and its parts particle use (omen and ote) verbs

entry.title: Síl.labes, tonificació i accentuació
entry.author: Neus Pascual Miralles
entry.summary: Clic activities in Catalan language formed by three thematic blocks: Syllables: to count syllables, separate syllables, digraphs and kinds of words. Stressing:stressed and unstressed syllables and types of words according to the tonic syllables. Accentuation rules:types of accents, accentuation words...

entry.title: Orden alfabético
entry.author: Aurelio Salvador Baselga
entry.summary: Clic activities about alphabetical order in Spanish. This package about the alphabetical order is grouped in 9 blocks of activities that present a progressive difficulty. It is thought to BE used from 2nd of Primary school to the first courses of Secondary school and has 460 different words in different activities. Each pupil can study continuously and progressively widening his/her practice. The aim of this package is increasing the degree of exercise difficulty progressively from knowing the order of the alphabet till be able to order groups of words. It¿s advisable that pupils have pencil and paper to write down the words that are going to order. This is a need for the ninth section.

entry.title: The animal
entry.author: Vicente Ferrer Rubio
entry.summary: Clic activities in English about the names of animals. In the package we find association activities, puzzles, text activities, and crosswords.

entry.title: English adjectives
entry.author: Andreu Cardo i Martínez
entry.summary: Clic activities in English about common adjectives, their antonyms and the place that occupy in the sentence.

entry.title: Estimulación del lenguaje
entry.author: José Pedro Roda Martínez
entry.summary: Clic activities about language stimulation in Spanish. In the package there are different kinds of activities: Spelling. Problems of reasoning, opposites and analogies. Confusion of phonemes, graphemes, associations, analogies, put in order. The months of the year and the days of the week. Temporary notions, to put in order and definitions. Situations, comparisons and classes. Similarities, synonymous, antonyms... Associations, sentences and riddles. Absurds, texts, rhymes and riddles. Different words. Temporary sequence. Alphabetical order. Reading understanding, descriptions and definitions.

entry.title: Vamos a leer
entry.author: José Pedro Roda Martínez
entry.summary: Clic activities to learn to read in Spanish. The package is divided in 14 parts with 14 different consonants: < I>p, s, l, m, t, n, d, ll, b/v, n, c/q, f, r/rr, ch. For each consonant there is a list of words that children must associate with a sound or with an image.

entry.title: Aprender a leer
entry.author: Andrea Carolina González Muñoz i Mónica Patricia Genet Guerrero
entry.summary: Activities based on the book "Lenguaje y Comunicación 1" (Editorial Universitaria - Chile - 2001), distributed by the Ministry of Education of the Republic of Chile. The aim of this application is learn to read in Spanish language. Throughout the package we study different consonants < B>l, M, S, T, P and N with activities of identification, puzzles, associations, text and writing answer.

entry.title: Comparatives and Superlatives
entry.author: Christine Irvin
entry.summary: Clic activities about comparatives and superlatives in English. The application has three activities with ten different adjectives.

entry.title: El pollito Chiqui
entry.author: Ana González i Ana Royo
entry.summary: Clic activities based on the story Ayuda, mamá, ayuda (Ediciones Beascoa Publishing house), destined to special education, infantile education and first cycle of primary school. The activity has four parts: Story to see. Wants to be the children¿s first attempt to start reading interactively and intuitively Activities 1. have 31 exercises where it¿s not necessary for the child to read. these activities contains very easy association exercises and puzzles playing with colours, sizes and space-time concepts. Story to read. The child can listen the tale or read it if the sound is switch it off. Activities 2. have 39 exercises, 11 of them are text based. this package also contains puzzles, numbers form 1 to 5, find the differences and word-image, word-word and sound-word associations.

entry.title: Phonetics
entry.author: Joan Barres i Sanz
entry.summary: Clic activities about English phonetics. The package has more than 80 activities where children can learn to pronounce words.

entry.title: Llengua valenciana 5è (Nova versió)
entry.author: Jesús Sánchez Aguado
entry.summary: Clic activities to learn the Valencian modality of the Catalan language. The activities can be carried out by one or two players

entry.title: Grupo CL
entry.author: Estela Rodriguez
entry.summary: Thirteen Clic activities about Spanish language with associations, puzzles, crosswords, etc about the recognition of the orthographic group Cl ( Clavar, clara, clase, clip...).

entry.title: Lengua castellana 5º (nueva versión)
entry.author: Jesús Sánchez Aguado
entry.summary: Clic activities about Spanish language for primary school, based on the text book "Lengua Castellana 5º" (ANAYA). The package has 18 lessons (as the book) and the activities can be carried out by one or two players.

entry.title: Relaciones semánticas
entry.author: Montse Estévez
entry.summary: Clic activities for Secondary School about semantic relations in Spanish.

entry.title: Exercicis de català, 6è
entry.author: Bernadette Inglada Berengueres
entry.summary: Clic activities about Catalan language based on the book Quadern d'ortografia

entry.title: Super Bus 1 (en, es)

entry.summary: Clic activities of English language for Catalan students, based on the book "Super bus 1" by Heinemann. The package has 8 parts with different things: colours, body, numbers, clothes, The little red riding hood, things in a classroom, the hours, etc.

entry.title: Super Bus 1
entry.author: Joan Barres i Sanz
entry.summary: Clic activities of English language for Catalan students, based on the book "Super bus 1" by Heinemann. The package has 8 parts with different things: colours, body, numbers, clothes, The little red riding hood, things in a classroom, the hours, etc.

entry.title: Arriver
entry.author: Llanos Navalón Yeste
entry.summary: Clic activities in French with dialogues and some activities about: Présent des verbes avoir, être, s¿appeler et habiter. Féminins irréguliers des adjectifs. Pronoms personnels toniques. C¿est/ il est. Les salutations et la politesse. Les professions. Les établissements scolaires français.

entry.title: La Palabra
entry.author: Immaculada Vilatersana Lluch
entry.summary: Clic activities package aimed at adults who take their first step in learning to read and write in Spanish.

entry.title: Town and country
entry.author: Ana Yagüe Ena
entry.summary: Clic activity pack about english as a foreign language. The main objectives are: To learn and practice vocabulary associated with the central topic To get familiar with the prononciation of the new words To recognize and use this vocabulary in a meaningful context (oral and written) To understand the structure and meaning of conditional sentences of the second type To write simple conditional sentences To predict which words are right in a context To understand the important information in a text about other cultures To use the Internet as a search device to obtain information about a given topic To elaborate a presentation with the information obtained

entry.author: Julio Nieto
entry.summary: Clic activity pack about the foreign language-French. Activities in the form of crossword puzzles.

entry.summary: Clic activities about the family in french. Good for students with an intermidiate level of this langage.

entry.summary: Activities about the story of Rosaflorida. Reading comprehension activities.

entry.summary: Galician literature activities that deal with some of the newest writers to have emerged from this lands.

entry.summary: English language activities centred around the topic of the Olympic games. It works on vocabulary as well as on some of the history and organization of these games.

entry.summary: Catalan language activities based upon the children's story "Ricitos de oro y los tres osos". The main concepts worked on are: Numbers 1-3 Size (small, medium, large) Logical sequences Spatial orientation

entry.author: M. Teresa Alcoceba Cardenal i Nieves Alcoceba

entry.author: Gerardo Valero Pozuelo
entry.summary: French language activities aimed at working the indicative present tense of the verbs ÊTRE and AVOIR and the regular verbs ending in -ER.

entry.title: Riddles
entry.author: Rosa M. Bergadà Llobet
entry.summary: Clic activity pack about English riddles. These activities are designed for English as a foreign language students. The level is very basic therefore apt for young students. The exercises deal with a few words but these are treated in a complete fashion, dealing with the sound of the word, a graphic representation of the object, how it's written, etc. The student also has the opportunity to record him/herself repeating the words and then listen to this recording and compare with the original representation given. The riddles presented in this activities were created by students of the school CEIP Sant Gil (Torà-Lleida).

entry.title: Valentine's day
entry.author: Ascensión Tello Garcia Col·laboració: Eulàlia Margarit Noguera Dibuixos: M. Pilar Méndez Fernández
entry.summary: English language activities about St.Valentines Day, for ESL students.

entry.title: Once upon a time
entry.author: María Ángel de Prado
entry.summary: Clic activity pack in English. Based on characters of famous children stories (Cinderella, Sleeping beauty, Asterix and Obelix, among others) which pretend to stimulate the young student into learning a series of basic words in English, as well as the names of these characters in English. The exercises are varied and have plenty of clever graphics showing the characters of these stories. The activities are directed towards elementary school children.

entry.title: Sopes de lletres
entry.author: Toni Miquel Mollà
entry.summary: Clic activity pack on language. The activities are divided into twelve packs that contain as themes: foods, tools, furniture, transport, fish, construction materials, toys, desserts. The activities contain word puzzles where all the words used in a section are found. The activities also have text to graphic association exercises.

entry.title: Jac i la mongetera màgica
entry.author: Antoni Prim Dibuixos: Joan Antoja Mas Veu: Helena Prim Rovira
entry.summary: Clic activities about the story of Jack and the beanstalk are a reduced version of this famous story. They are defined into three sections according to their difficulty and are directed towards students of parbulary and elementary school. The activities contain sound and music files to make it possible for students without reading skills to participate in the activities, as well as enhance the interface and make it more appealing for students who do know how to read. The activities have the following sections: READ THE STORY DO THE PUZZLES AND PAINT STRIP THE OGRE MATCH WORDS AND DRAWINGS It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.author: César Martínez Iturralde
entry.summary: Clic activities based on a program of UNICEF: LA VOZ DE LOS NIÑOS (The voice of the children). In order to finish another three activities that serves as a compendium of all the package (to write a letter and a descriptive text).
